thread.title: Re: Cat fights EVERYWHERE! Debra Messing trashes Susan Sarandon in a subtweet, gets slammed
thread.title_full: Re: Cat fights EVERYWHERE! Debra Messing trashes Susan Sarandon in a subtweet, gets slammed

author: TMM Goes To Washington
title: Re: Cat fights EVERYWHERE! Debra Messing trashes Susan Sarandon in a subtweet, gets slammed
text:
Whether you agree with Sarandon’s politics or not, watching the Clinton cult go after her for refusing to support Hillary is very telling. 
Others thought Messing’s behavior was sideways and petty as well: 
— Alexandra Halaby (@iskandrah) February 20, 2017 @DebraMessing Ah…so a lot of corporatist Dems. must have been there. Susan Sarandon has saved lives along w/the innocence project. You? 
— Joe McGaha (@bourbonroad) February 20, 2017 @DebraMessing Jesus let, it go already. She wasn't the reason Trump made it into the White House. 
— Roqayah Chamseddine (@roqchams) February 20, 2017 @DebraMessing watching the left eat its own is fabulous pic.twitter.com/mciTrnYvTn 
— ericthebuilder (@ethebuilder) February 20, 2017 
We sorta love it when they eat their own. Ha! . @DebraMessing Amazing how inclusive your movement has become lulz just kidding you all will continue to push ppl away. Hate doesn't win. 
— Mujahed Kobbe (@Moj_kobe) February 20, 2017 @DebraMessing maybe she should have just attended the "virtual rally" 
Awww yes, the virtual reality that Messing attended with a creepy selfie: #SolidaritySelfie I join the Virtual March in solidarity with Muslims and Immigrants. #NoBanNoWall pic.twitter.com/TjKtlkLrr4 
— Debra Messing (@DebraMessing) January 25, 2017 
*popcorn*
